name: rip_quick_add
description: Quickly create Google Calendar events from natural language.

scripts.build: rollup -c -i src/background.js -o chrome-extension/background.js && rollup -c -i src/popup.js -o chrome-extension/popup.js && rollup -c -i src/options.js -o chrome-extension/options.js
scripts.watch: rollup -c --watch -i src/background.js -o chrome-extension/background.js & rollup -c --watch -i src/popup.js -o chrome-extension/popup.js & rollup --watch -c -i src/options.js -o chrome-extension/options.js

author: Max Timkovich
